game.name: Mermaid Halloween Parties
game.description:
Oh great! The phone of your favorite princess Ariel got the ring in the morning today leaving her surprised. She has again got the invitations for the wonderful Halloween party. This time she has accepted the invitations from their five close friends. However, the problem is that each party is based on a unique theme so she needs your help. Join Mermaid Halloween Parties and be prepared to guide this gorgeous girl to choose the five different costumes! Many surprises are waiting for you at this darkest night of the year.

For the first party, give her a white color top with some fringes, a colorful top or a green color short dress and combine it with a matching pair of pants. You can also choose a one-piece dress like a black outfit with a white-collar or a mini midi yellow skirt. Complete her look with a matching pair of sunglasses, a beautiful tiara, or a colorful muffler! Now turn to dress her up for the second party where she would love to carry a long outfit in a black and red color or a dress with a skeleton printed on it. Add the other scary items to her dress to give her a nice spooky look.

In the third party, she has a wide array of long designer dresses with elegant flares at the bottom to choose from. Complete her look with a matching crown and then move to choose the dress for her fourth party â€“ The Wild West! Give her a green short dress with some fringes and pair it with a lovely skirt and a white color hat or a guitar for fun in this HTML5 dressing game! For the firth party, find a white shirt with a sleeveless check sweater or a matching check skirt or a legging for the girl. Complete her look with a black tie, a pair of sunglasses or a set of some books! Good luck to have a fun, no download required!
